DiscrepancyNoteAction.Message: Hemoglobin is out of the expected range (12-17.5 gm/dL). Please verify your response.
Hemoglobin is out of the expected range (120-175 gm/L). Please verify your response.
RBC is out of the expected range (4-6 trillion cells/L). Please verify your response.
RBC is out of the expected range (4-6 million cells/mcL). Please verify your response.
WBC is out of the expected range (3.5-10.5 billion cells/L). Please verify your response.
WBC is out of the expected range (3,500-10,500 cells/mcL). Please verify your response.
Rheumatoid Factor is out of the expected range (0-60 IU/mL). Please verify your response.
Potassium is out of the expected range (3.5-5 mEq/L). Please verify your response.
Potassium is out of the expected range (3-5.5 mmol/L). Please verify your response.
Calcium is out of the expected range (8.5-10.2 mg/dL). Please verify your response.
Calcium is out of the expected range (2-3 mmol/L). Please verify your response.
Albumin is out of the expected range (3.4-5.4 g/dL). Please verify your response.
Albumin is out of the expected range (5-8 umol/L). Please verify your response.

RuleDef.Name: Local Lab: Site A, C, E Hemoglobin
RuleDef.Description: Site A, C, E: Hemoglobin should be between 12 and 17.5 gm/dL
RuleDef.Expression: (SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 101 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 103 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 105) and (I_LOCAL_HEM_HEM lt 12 or I_LOCAL_HEM_HEM gt 17.5)

RuleDef.Name: Local Lab: Site B, D Hemoglobin
RuleDef.Description: Site B, D: Hemoglobin should be between 120 and 175 gm/L
RuleDef.Expression: (SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 102 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 104) and (I_LOCAL_HEM_HEM lt 120 or I_LOCAL_HEM_HEM gt 175)

RuleDef.Name: Local Lab: Site A, C, E RBC
RuleDef.Description: Site A, C, E: RBC should be between 4 and 6 trillion cells/L
RuleDef.Expression: (SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 101 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 103 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 105) and (I_LOCAL_HEM_RBC lt 4 or I_LOCAL_HEM_RBC gt 6)

RuleDef.Name: Local Lab: Site B, D RBC
RuleDef.Description: Site B, D: RBC should be between 4 and 6 million cells/mcL
RuleDef.Expression: (SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 102 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 104) and (I_LOCAL_HEM_RBC lt 4 or I_LOCAL_HEM_RBC gt 6)

RuleDef.Name: Local Lab: Site A, C, E WBC
RuleDef.Description: Site A, C, E: WBC should be between 3.5 and 10.5 billion cells/L
RuleDef.Expression: (SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 101 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 103 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 105) and (I_LOCAL_HEM_WBC lt 3.5 or I_LOCAL_HEM_WBC gt 10.5)

RuleDef.Name: Local Lab: Site B, D WBC
RuleDef.Description: Site B, D: WBC should be between 3,500 and 10,500 cells/mcL
RuleDef.Expression: (SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 102 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 104) and (I_LOCAL_HEM_WBC lt 3500 or I_LOCAL_HEM_WBC gt 10500)

RuleDef.Name: Local Lab: All Site Rhe factor
RuleDef.Description: All Sites: Rhe factor should be between 0 and 60 IU/mL

RuleDef.Name: Local Lab: Site A, C, E Potassium
RuleDef.Description: Site A, C, E: Potassium should be between 3.5 and 5 mEq/L
RuleDef.Expression: (SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 101 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 103 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 105) and (I_LOCAL_CH_POT lt 3.5 or I_LOCAL_CH_POT gt 5)

RuleDef.Name: Local Lab: Site B, D Potassium
RuleDef.Description: Site B, D: Potassium should be between 3 and 5.5 mmol/L
RuleDef.Expression: (SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 102 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 104) and (I_LOCAL_CH_POT lt 3 or I_LOCAL_CH_POT gt 5.5)

RuleDef.Name: Local Lab: Site A, C, E Calcium
RuleDef.Description: Site A, C, E: Calcium should be between 8.5 and 10.2 mg/dL
RuleDef.Expression: (SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 101 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 103 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 105) and (I_LOCAL_CH_CAL lt 8.5 or I_LOCAL_CH_CAL gt 10.2)

RuleDef.Name: Local Lab: Site B, D Calcium
RuleDef.Description: Site B, D: Calcium should be between 2 and 3 mmol/L
RuleDef.Expression: (SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 102 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 104) and (I_LOCAL_CH_CAL lt 2 or I_LOCAL_CH_CAL gt 3)

RuleDef.Name: Local Lab: Site A, C, E Albumin
RuleDef.Description: Site A, C, E: Albumin should be between 3.4 and 5.4 g/dL
RuleDef.Expression: (SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 101 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 103 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 105) and (I_LOCAL_CH_ALB lt 3.4 or I_LOCAL_CH_ALB gt 5.4)

RuleDef.Name: Local Lab: Site B, D Albumin
RuleDef.Description: Site B, D: Albumin should be between 5 and 8 umol/L
RuleDef.Expression: (SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 102 or SE_FIRSTVISIT.F_LOCALLABORAT.IG_LOCAL_TESTS.I_LOCAL_SITE_AB eq 104) and (I_LOCAL_CH_ALB lt 5 or I_LOCAL_CH_ALB gt 8)
